archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1318
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to be able to learn more about Vodafone privacy and security policies, so that I can feel confident knowing my information will be kept secure.

properties.value: Generic information not related to any particular service. Rather a part of VF CMS, may be linked to particular offering page

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
